text: Serge Lepeltier (born in 1953) is a French politician.Raffarin nombra a Sarkozy al frente del Ministerio de Economía en el nuevo Gobierno francés He was Ministry of Defense and then Ministry of the Environment.Serge Lepeltier, nouveau ministre de l'Ecologie et du développement durable He graduated from HEC Paris.La prise de tête Serge Lepeltier == Award == * Legion of Honour == References == Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French politicians
title: Serge Lepeltier
